urls.title: Sully Says: "It's a Sign of a Good Team, When You Bend But Don't Break"
urls.description: The Penguins got a 4-3 overtime victory in the first game of their back-to-back home-and-home with Buffalo.

data.text:
Coach Sullivan: "I think it's a sign of a good team, when you can bend, but don't break."

More from Coach: https://t.co/RhkmhIPVEt https://t.co/S5ZkCXs2GO

Big Jeff Carter on what he was thinking right before his overtime goal: “Put it in the net? What else would you think? Honestly, I didn't see it come through the D’s legs there and it just hit my skate and kinda sat nicely for me. It was a really nice play by Ricky.” https://t.co/5ZR4dbn4ie
Love thy goalie 💛 https://t.co/FZQePBKDiE

The first half of our home and home against Buffalo starts tonight.

Game preview: https://t.co/igR2mOYyss https://t.co/vnYeEe4trP

urls.title: Letang Cleared to Practice with Penguins, 10 Days After Suffering Stroke
urls.description: "He's always surprised us with how well he heals. We don't think that this (return) is accelerated in any way," said head team physician Dr. Dharmesh Vyas. "We're taking all the right precautions to make sure that he's safe to go out and play."

data.text:
Letang on returning to practice: "The team brought me in and treated me like they usually do. So that made me feel at home and felt comfortable. To be around them, watch the games, be able to practice today - it's great for the mind." 

Read more: https://t.co/dmdTaPMLMi https://t.co/CVb4pDK2u7
Coach Sullivan talks about Kris Letang rejoining practice, tomorrow's matchup at Buffalo, and recent team performance in today's media availability ⬇️ https://t.co/3CWr7kZpBG
Best suit game in the league 💯 https://t.co/fT3o1XtR5P
To Buffalo we go ✈️ https://t.co/hLmLF5GiAb
Jeff Carter on @Letang_58 returning to practice: "It is obviously a big boost for our team." https://t.co/GXXRWPoxzV

Sidney Crosby is happy to have teammate @Letang_58 back practicing with the team.

Hear what he had to say following today's skate ⬇️ https://t.co/gRxGTO2jXS
What a legend 😛 https://t.co/AlUwLTtuyQ

Dr. Vyas on Letang: "He's always surprised us with how well he heals. We don't think this is accelerated in any way, we're taking all the right precautions to make sure he is safe to go out and play. And when that time comes, we'll let him go back to playing his sport."
Dr. Vyas on Letang: "Certainly it is not the sport that created this problem for him... We don't think that playing the sport itself is risky for him."

Dr. Vyas on Letang: "His stroke this time was much smaller than it was last time. His symptoms have resolved a lot quicker than they did the last time as well. We know what to expect - the data has also evolved in terms of how this hole (in his heart) is to be treated."

Delivering smiles this holiday season 😁🎄

To all the kids at @ChildrensPgh, thank you for brightening our day. https://t.co/MBZu0bojQ1
Lookin' good out there, @Letang_58! https://t.co/VfatIotq8z
GOOD NEWS ALERT! 🚨 https://t.co/Tqy0ovCM6K
Today @Letang_58, @POJoseph15, @tjarry35, and @Jason_Zucker16 visited @ChildrensPgh to lift some spirits and spread some holiday cheer ❤️ https://t.co/ieM2jRRI8v

urls.title: Rally For The Sidney Crosby Foundation - Alltroo
urls.description: The Sidney Crosby Foundation enhances the lives of children and benefits children’s charities. The foundation is a proud supporter of The Churchill Academy, The IWK Health Centre Teen Lounge, Autism Nova Scotia, Phoenix House, Family SOS and the Breakfast Club of Canada. This sweepstakes raises funds for Change Starts With Me (“CSWM”) which is a charitable nonprofit described in Section 501(c)(3) of the Internal Revenue Code. 100% percent of the donations from this sweepstakes go to CSWM. CSWM has

GM Ron Hextall on Poulin: "The Penguins support Sam's decision to take time away from hockey to focus on himself. As with all of our players, our priority is them as individuals first. We look forward to having him back with the team when he is ready."

urls.title: Penguins Forward Sam Poulin to Take A Leave of Absence
urls.description: Pittsburgh Penguins forward Sam Poulin will be taking a leave of absence from the Wilkes-Barre/Scranton Penguins due to personal reasons.

data.text:
Forward Sam Poulin will be taking a leave of absence from the @WBSPenguins due to personal reasons.

Poulin will return home to Quebec and continue his workouts on and off the ice.

Guentzel has returned to the ice and went straight to the box to serve his penalty.

Jake Guentzel gave Jeff Skinner a little whack, and he retaliated in a big way, cross-checking him repeatedly and catching him up high. Guentzel was bleeding and headed to the room.

They each got two minutes for slashing, with Skinner also getting a five-minute major.
